body_html:
What is your nvcc --version?

Are you using the Eigen in third_party (there should be a line in your cmake output, something like "Using Eigen from third_party")? If so can you try using MKL instead of Eigen?
body_text:
What is your nvcc --version?
Are you using the Eigen in third_party (there should be a line in your cmake output, something like "Using Eigen from third_party")? If so can you try using MKL instead of Eigen?
body:
What is your nvcc --version?

Are you using the Eigen in third_party (there should be a line in your cmake output, something like "Using Eigen from third_party")? If so can you try using MKL instead of Eigen?
